contentrichtext.text: {{unreferenced|date=March 2013}} {{Infobox settlement |official_name = Boxmeer | image_skyline = Overzicht van de voorgevel - Boxmeer - 20384805 - RCE.jpg | image_caption = Town hall | image_flag = Boxmeer vlag.svg | flag_size = 100x67px | flag_alt = Flag of Boxmeer | image_seal = | seal_size = | seal_alt = | image_shield = Coat of arms of Boxmeer.svg | shield_size = 100x80px | shield_alt = Coat of arms of Boxmeer |image_map = LocatieBoxmeer.png |mapsize = 250px |coordinates_display = inline,title |coordinates_region = NL |subdivision_type = Country |subdivision_name = [[Netherlands]] |subdivision_type1 = Province |subdivision_name1 = [[North Brabant]] |area_footnotes = (2006) |area_total_km2 = 113.95 |area_land_km2 = 111.56 |area_water_km2 = 2.38 |population_as_of = 31 May, 2009 |population_note = Source: [[Statistics Netherlands|CBS]], [http://statline.cbs.nl/ Statline]. |settlement_type = Municipality |population_total = 28579 |population_density_km2 = 256 |timezone = [[Central European Time|CET]] |utc_offset = +1 |timezone_DST = [[Central European Summer Time|CEST]] |utc_offset_DST = +2 |latd=51|latm=39|lats=|latNS=N |longd=05|longm=57|longs=|longEW=E }} '''Boxmeer''' ({{pronunciation|181 Boxmeer.ogg}}) is a [[municipality]] and a town in the southern [[Netherlands]]. It incorporates the former municipality of [[Beugen en Rijkevoort]] and that of [[Vierlingsbeek]]. In Overloon is the [[Overloon War Museum]]. == Population centres == * [[Beugen]] * Boxmeer * [[Groeningen, North Brabant|Groeningen]] * [[Holthees]] * [[Maashees]] * [[Oeffelt]] * [[Overloon]] * [[Rijkevoort]] * [[Sambeek]] * [[Vierlingsbeek]] * [[Vortum-Mullem]] == Transport == * [[Boxmeer railway station]] ==Gallery== <gallery> File:Diorama Invasion 1944 in Liberty Park, Overloon War Museum.jpg|Diorama Invasion 1944, [[Overloon War Museum]] </gallery> == External links == {{Commons category}} * {{Official website|http://www.boxmeer.nl }} * [http://www.boxmeer.info Informative Website] {{Geographic location | Centre = Boxmeer | Northeast = ''[[Meuse (river)|Maas]]'' / [[Gennep]] ([[Limburg (Netherlands)|LI]]) | East = ''[[Meuse (river)|Maas]]'' / [[Bergen, Limburg|Bergen]] ([[Limburg (Netherlands)|LI]]) | South = [[Venray]] ([[Limburg (Netherlands)|LI]]) | West = [[Sint Anthonis]] | Northwest = [[Cuijk]] }} {{North Brabant Province}} [[Category:Municipalities of North Brabant]] [[Category:Populated places in North Brabant]] {{NorthBrabant-geo-stub}}
